title: The Artist speaks: Kenneth Armitage
brief_description: Kenneth Armitage, the young British sculptor, discusses his work. Examples of Armitage’s work, mostly human figures; his London studio; his collection of photographs and cuttings; how an idea from a photograph is worked on through sketches to the plaster statue ready for casting.
